net.java.jddac.common.type
Class Uncertainty

java.lang.Object
  net.java.jddac.common.type.Uncertainty

public class Uncertainty
extends java.lang.Object

Represents the uncertainty of a numeric value. Internally the uncertainty value is represented as a double.
